title: An East River Idyll
provenance_text:
Henry Ward Ranger [1858-1916]. William T. Evans, New York, by 1900. (American Art Association, New York, by January 31, 1900 until February 2, 1900) [1]; purchased by Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, 1900. 
NOTES: [1] Auction of William T. Evans collection.

creator.birth_place: Syracuse (Onondaga county, New York state, United States)
creator.death_place: New York City (New York state, United States)
